product_name: The North Face Farrows Twill Insulated Pants - Women's Petite - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When you're seeking powder on the mountain, wear The North Face Farrows Twill Insulated Pants in women's petite sizes. They offer a slim fit, waterproof protection and warmth for style and comfort . 2-layer HyVent(R) shell pants are waterproof, windproof and breathable; seams are sealed to prevent moisture from seeping through. Heatseeker(TM) polyester-fiber insulation helps keep your legs warm while you're romping about in the snow; insulation packs down easily for compact stowing. Chimney Venting(TM) design uses StretchVent(TM) gaiters and zippered thigh vents with mesh gussets to let you control airflow. Rip-and-stick tabs on waistband adjust the fit. Zippered handwarmer pockets; back pockets. Reinforced cuffs resist abrasion from boots, boards and skis. The North Face Farrows Twill Insulated Pants in women's petite sizes have a slim fit. Closeout.
